name: Alieksieiev Vladyslav
text: Noting your successes and achievements is important to maintain motivation and development in your chosen field.

name: Averkin Maksym
text: “To understand the mid code, you have to be mid.  To understand the code of a senior, it is enough to be a junior.” Gabe Logan Newell

name: Vyshnevska Maryna
text: I thank Goit and our mentors for their support! And now I can say that I know what a Dream team is! This is our team! I wish everyone to find the best job in their lives and be happy!

name: Pysarenko Tetiana
text: It's been an interesting year! Thanks to everyone! Choose a job to your liking, and you won't have to work a single day in your life. - Confucius.

name: Podoliako Oleksandr
text: Success is the ability to move from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm. W. Churchill

name: Yurov Igor
text: I wish that your sleep is always sound and healthy, and that coding brings you joy and fulfillment, embodying your ideas into greatness!

name: Lipchanskyi Pavlo
text: Wish everyone to find your guiding star, that makes you move on!

name: Ivan Koshel
text: Sleep is a blessing, but writing code is an embodiment of magnificence!

name: Litvin Serhii
text: The one who does nothing makes no mistakes. Don't be afraid to make mistakes - be afraid to repeat mistakes.— Theodore Roosevelt.

name: Vyshnevska Maryna
text: I thank Goit and our mentors for their support! And now I can say that I know what a dream team is! This is our team! I wish everyone to find the best job in their lives and be happy!
